name.japanese: 魚人島への海底ルート

description: The dangerous underwater passage that leads from the surface to Fish-Man Island, 10,000 meters below the sea. Features powerful currents, sea monsters, and other hazards.

keyEvents.title: Caribou Pirates Attack
keyEvents.description: The Caribou Pirates attack the Straw Hats while traveling through the underwater route.

keyEvents.title: Caught in Undersea Current
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny is caught in a dangerous downward current while Nami explains the hazards of underwater navigation.

keyEvents.title: Kraken Encounter
keyEvents.description: The crew encounters Surume the Kraken blocking their path in the underwater route.

notes: Extremely dangerous passage requiring specialized ship coating and skilled navigation

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, a brigantine-rigged sloop designed and built by Franky. Currently coated with a protective bubble for underwater travel.

keyEvents.title: Caribou Boards the Ship
keyEvents.description: Caribou successfully boards the Thousand Sunny during the underwater attack.

keyEvents.title: Ship Defense with New Weapons
keyEvents.description: The crew defends the Thousand Sunny using their new post-timeskip abilities, including Franky's rocket launchers, Chopper's Guard Point, and Robin's Gigantesco Mano.

notes: Ship is protected by bubble coating for underwater travel to Fish-Man Island
